original_text: I will fix him strongly in his place, like a peg in a strong wall. Because of him, people will respect and praise his father's family. I will fix him strongly in his place, like a peg in a strong wall. Because of him, people will respect and praise his father's family.
korean_text: 못이 단단한 곳에 박힘 같이 그를 견고하게 하리니 그가 그의 아버지 집에 영광의 보좌가 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: I will fix him strongly in his place
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그를 그의 자리에 굳게 세우리라

sentences.original_text: like a peg in a strong wall
people will respect and praise his father's family
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그의 아버지 집을 존경하고 칭송하리라
